VibeAI Privacy Policy

100% Local Processing Zero Data Collection
Core Principle: Your conversations stay private. VibeAI processes everything locally on your device. We never send, store, or access your data.

What VibeAI Does

VibeAI analyzes the emotional tone of your AI conversations in real-time to help you understand conversational resonance. All analysis happens locally in your browser using the HugoScore emotional coherence engine.

What Data We Access

  • AI chat text: Read-only access to conversations on ChatGPT, Claude, Gemini, and Copilot
  • Local storage: Saves your consent preference and extension settings on your device only

What We DO NOT Do

  • No servers - we don't operate any backend infrastructure
  • No data collection - we don't log, store, or transmit your conversations
  • No tracking - no analytics, telemetry, or usage monitoring
  • No third parties - we don't share data with anyone (because we don't have any data to share)

Your Privacy Controls

Consent Required: VibeAI only activates after you explicitly grant permission. You can revoke consent at any time.

To Disable: Remove the extension from Chrome, or click "Maybe Later" in the consent modal to pause analysis temporarily.

To Delete Data: All data is local - simply uninstalling the extension removes everything.

Open Source Commitment

VibeAI's core emotional analysis engine is built on transparent, auditable code. While the HugoScore algorithm is patent-pending (USPTO #63/856,714), we maintain privacy-first architecture with no external dependencies.
